TopicTitle: Landing a Spaceplane On a Very Tiny Island

Articles.Content:
All I can say is, this landing made my day.

This is the path I took to the island

Zoomed in on destination to show how small the island is

Landing went... well. No one died. I call that a success.

Zoomed out again to fit the entire island.

I just felt the need to show it off Enjoy!

Did the same thing, the parachutes helped on the short landing strip.

Reminds me of landing planes in FSX on those small deserted islands in the middle of the oceans.
Wow, congratulations! I usually need around a full 2 kilometers to stop my planes (mostly because the brakes will slam the nose into the ground).
Sounds like you\'ve some balancing issues there, Radion. Try putting wheels under the nose of the plane.
